definitions.body: carcass, of lion, ´[[מ]] cstr. Ju Jdg 14:8.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a ruin, [[מַפַּלְתּוֹ]] Ez Eze 31:13 (kg. under fig. of tree).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: overthrow, id. v:Eze 31:16 (same fig.); [[מַפַּלְתְֶָּ]] (kg.) Eze 32:10; [[מַפַּלְתֵּח]] of Tyre) Eze 26:15, Eze 26:18, Eze 27:27; [[מַפַּלְתָּם]] (of wicked) Pr 29:16.
